data.name: Fast/Precise Natural Logarithm
data.description:
Write an implementation of the natural logarithm function precise to __at least 14 decimals places__. 

You will have at your disposal __only the basic arithmetic tools__, namely addition, subtraction, multiplication, division and exponentiation.

Your implementation must be fast enough to calculate __1,000,000 values in less than 12 seconds__.

Detail:
- A negative input will give `undefined`
- A `x = 0`  input will give `-Infinity`

Remarks:
- A good method can be quickly find on google or you can check this link https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logarithm#Power_series
- It may be interesting to study the `DataView` class in Javascript, but there are at your disposal two functions namely `exponent` and `mantissa` if you do not have the courage to code them yourself.
- The "mantissas homogeneity" part can help you to calibrate your function, be creative
